General.Name: Top High Image
General.Description: Top High Image Corp. produces and sells printing plates and consumables. The company offers offset printing plates, such as thermal CTP plates, UV CTP plates, and PS plates; and printing consumables, including BOPP films, UV over printing varnish, wash clothes, sublimation transfer paper, hot stamping foil, cold foil, and synthetic paper. It sells its products to Europe, the United States, the Middle East, and Southeast Asian countries. The company was formerly known as Top Light Metal Industries Corporation and changed its name to Top High Image Corp. in 2000. Top High Image Corp. was founded in 1998 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
